replies.msg: What's the best way of expanding your vocabulary? The answer is via reading, creating sentences with new words in them, writing and pronouncing them. I try to learn ten new vocabulary items a day to improve my vocabulary. I have a very large vocabulary whereas my brother's vocabulary is fairly small. I have an active vocabulary of around sixty five million nine hundred one thousand one hundred words. Your passive vocabulary is much more extensive than your active vocabulary.
